value.verse: Give ear to my words, O LORD; *

value.halfverse: for I make my prayer to you.
value.verse: Hearken to my cry for help, my King and my God, *

value.halfverse: early in the morning I make my appeal and watch for you.
value.verse: In the morning, LORD, you hear my voice; *
For you are not a God who takes pleasure in wickedness, *
value.halfverse: and evil cannot dwell with you.
you hate all those who work wickedness.
value.verse: Braggarts cannot stand in your sight; *

value.halfverse: the bloodthirsty and deceitful, O LORD, you abhor.
value.verse: You destroy those who speak lies; *
But as for me, through the greatness of your mercy I will go into your house; *
value.halfverse: I will bow down toward your holy temple in awe of you.
make your way straight before me.
value.verse:
Lead me, O LORD, in your righteousness,
because of those who lie in wait for me; *

value.halfverse: there is destruction in their heart;
value.verse: For there is no truth in their mouth; *
Their throat is an open grave; *

value.halfverse: let them fall, because of their schemes.
for they have rebelled against you.
value.verse: Because of their many transgressions cast them out, *

value.halfverse: they will sing out their joy for ever.
value.verse: But all who take refuge in you will be glad; *

value.halfverse: so that those who love your Name may exult in you.
you will defend them with your favor as with a shield.
value.verse: For you, O LORD, will bless the righteous; *
